1370: Lutghardis was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Folpertus at age 26 in 1370.
Gave birth to Blankard in 1370 at age 26.
Lost son Blankard when Blankard was 1 years old.
1371: Gave birth to Leanne in 1371 at age 27.
1372: Gave birth to Myrthel in 1372 at age 28.
1374: Gave birth to Nanne in 1374 at age 30.
1375: Gave birth to Ryccie in 1375 at age 31.
1379: Gave birth to Hylonus in 1379 at age 35.
1382: Gave birth to Agnes in 1382 at age 38.
1383: Gave birth to Nannekin in 1383 at age 39.
Lost daughter Agnes when Agnes was 2 years old.
1385: Gave birth to Siwa in 1385 at age 41.
1387: Lost son Hylonus when Hylonus was 9 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
